item.title: Threat Hunting for Beginners: Hunting Standard Dll-Injected C2 Implants (Practical Course)
item.description: NOTE THIS IS CURRENTLY STILL WIP, THE REASON IT’S A PUBLIC DRAFT IS LONG AND CONVOLUTED SO JUST TRUST ME. ANYHOO - DO AS YOU WISH. Hello friend, so glad you could make it. This is the first in an ongoing + always-evolving series on threat hunting. The main thing I want you to know about this course is that we will learn by doing. Set up We’ll start off by creating + configuring our own virtual network, including VMs for the victim, attacker, and analyst.
